title: Episode #5. The History of The Murdaugh Family
description:
We examine how the Murdaugh family came to hold legal power for close to a hundred years in the low country of SC. Their history and connections may play into the murders. #murdaugh #murdaughmurders 


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations
